#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t,n,ar[50],ans,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		ans=10000;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>ar[i];
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			count=0;
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(ar[i]!=ar[j]+i-j)
				count++;
			}
			if(ans>count)
			ans=count;
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
}
